TopicTitle: Crash on 1.3 exiting from runway to SPH

Articles.Content:
In sandbox I tested a downloaded craft* and first got this issue:

*Perhaps the craft is borked, or the name (also file name) is not okay -> Cormorán

I removed the mod Dynamic Deflection for a new test and then this happened as I wanted to just exit from flight mode (still on runway) back to SPH:
https://www.dropbox.com/s/n9uicfz0v5v9g9n/2017-06-13-2 KSP crash.dmp.zip?dl=1
